synopsis: A mysterious army appears in Kobe without warning.  A state of emergency is declared, and a feirce battle between Z/X and Z/X begins.  Azuma Tennoji fights with his partner Z/X Fierte to protect his beloved Kobe.

Ayase Kamiyugi and her black Z/X, Sieger, are after the angel who has fallen from the sky.  Azuma tries hard to protect her, but that puts his own life in danger.  Just when he thinks it's the end, he hears the voice of the mysterious girl he met.
Ayase Kamiyugi and Sieger attack Fierte and Azuka Tennoji with great ferocity.  Azuma has no experience with Z/X fighting, so he is helpless against his veteran opponents.
One of the Twelve Apostolic Angels of the White World, Aquarius Gambriel, suddenly appears before Azuma.  But Fierte is uneasy at the appearance of what should be a friend.

Asuka learns that it's Aina's birthday and asks everyone there to make a cake. But Ayase and Azumi and the other girls have never made one. The kitchen at Cafe Brocollo is in chaos. Meanwhile, an eerie gaze is watching them...
Chitose Aoba and her partner Z/X Rindoh escape the military base in Tohoku and run to Fukuoka in Kyuushuu to escape. There they find a paradise where humans and Z/X work hand in hand.

After the shocking incident with Aina, Azuma tries to repair his relationship with her. But Aina has closed herself off to him and is avoiding him. Meanwhile, Riguel and Azumi and Ayase and Suiger are fighting an unknown enemy.
Alexander and Mikado Kurosaki's forces take over Kobe, and the city is filled with tanks and troops. Meanwhile, Asuka searches for the monster Audium, who is hiding somewhere in the city.

Ayase Kamiyugi is known as the "Angel Killer" because of her repeated attacks on angels. On the 7th of January, she swore to take revenge on the angels who killed her family. She visits the spot where they died, and her dark past is revealed.

Riguel runs out of the medicine that keeps her partner Azumi's disease in check and returns to the blue world to get more. There she learns a shocking truth about the relationship between Azumi and the blue world.

Audium appears before Azuma and Mikado with a terrible cry. Alexander deems her a worthy opponent and attacks, overwhelming her with his supreme power. And when he is about to finish her, Audium's true nature is revealed.

Odium has turned into a giant monster. To save his friends, Asuka Tennoji attacks her in one last desperate attempt. Ayase, Azumi, Chitose, Ayano, and Mikado each hope for something different in the battle. What color future will Asuka Tennoji create?
